location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: coloured and black ink on tracing linen.Dimensions: 475 x 480mm.

mods.abstract: Sketch map showing a topographical view of the region of Soor [Sur] in Oman. The map also shows the village of Aiqa [Al â€˜Ayjah]. A table showing the elevation level measured by foot is provided at the bottom of the map in the centre. The name of a surveyor, Jamaluddin, is provided at the bottom left-hand corner.
